subject: Management
title: Change as Opportunity
description: Learn Change as Opportunity in one minute.

hook.text: Netflix pivoted from DVD to streaming. Blockbuster didn't. One saw change as opportunity. The other saw threat.

buildup.text: Every disruption is simultaneously a threat and an opportunity. Your frame determines your response.

discovery.text: Organizations that frame change as opportunity attract talent, investment, and energy toward it.

twist.text: The same change that destroys one company builds another. The difference is mindset, not circumstance.

climax.text: Reframe every change: what does this make possible? That question unlocks energy the threat frame locks away.

punchline.text: Every change is a door. Walk through it before someone else does.

quiz.question: How should organizations frame change?
options: As an opportunity that makes new possibilities available
As a threat to be defended against at all costs
Change should not be framed at all to keep things neutral
